image-alt: summer scene of rolling fields of the Palouse with mountains in the background and scattering of big pines
title: Happy Summer!
paragraph: The Library's summer hours are in effect from May 11 - August 23. If you're not at the beach, stop by, we'd love to see you!

image-alt: Young Men Diving into Lake during CCC Carnival
title: Dive in!
paragraph: Take time to explore our digital collections featuring historic content from Special Collections.

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

image-alt: group portrait of 11 employees of Twin Falls station is pasted on a page containing handwritten notes
title: Stories from Spec
paragraph: Check out Special Collections and Archives' Harvester blog featuring the unique materials stewarded by the library.
